1.name: Saving Private Ryan
1.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

2.name: The Big Lebowski
2.description: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

3.name: American History X
3.description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

4.name: The Wedding Singer
4.description: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

5.name: Elizabeth
5.description: The early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

6.name: The Truman Show
6.description: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

7.name: Mulan
7.description: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

8.name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
8.description: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

9.name: Meet Joe Black
9.description: Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter.

10.name: The Mask of Zorro
10.description: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

11.name: Shakespeare in Love
11.description: The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

12.name: Armageddon
12.description: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

13.name: Rushmore
13.description: The extracurricular king of Rushmore Preparatory School is put on academic probation.

14.name: A Bug's Life
14.description: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

15.name: You've Got Mail
15.description: Two business rivals who despise each other in real life unwittingly fall in love over the Internet.

16.name: The Parent Trap
16.description: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, later discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

17.name: The Faculty
17.description: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurrences.

18.name: The Thin Red Line
18.description: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

19.name: There's Something About Mary
19.description: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

20.name: Wild Things
20.description: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

21.name: Deep Impact
21.description: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepare for the worst.

22.name: Blade
22.description: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

23.name: Buffalo '66
23.description: After being released from prison, Billy is set to visit his parents with his wife, whom he does not actually have. This provokes Billy to act out, as he kidnaps a girl and forces her to act as his wife for the visit.

24.name: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
24.description: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

25.name: The Waterboy
25.description: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

26.name: Rush Hour
26.description: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

27.name: What Dreams May Come
27.description: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

28.name: Doctor Dolittle
28.description: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

29.name: The Prince of Egypt
29.description: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

30.name: The Man in the Iron Mask
30.description: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

31.name: Practical Magic
31.description: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.

32.name: Star Trek: Insurrection
32.description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

33.name: Dark City
33.description: A man struggles with memories of his past, which includes a wife he cannot remember, and a nightmarish world without a sun.

34.name: Ronin
34.description: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

35.name: Lost in Space
35.description: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

36.name: Lethal Weapon 4
36.description: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with deadly Chinese triads that are trying to free their former leaders out of prison and onto American soil.

37.name: The Horse Whisperer
37.description: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

38.name: Godzilla
38.description: A giant, reptilian monster surfaces, leaving destruction in its wake as it strides into New York City. To stop it, an earthworm scientist, his reporter ex-girlfriend, and other unlikely heroes team up to save their city.

39.name: Enemy of the State
39.description: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

40.name: Cats
40.description: "Jellicle" cats join for a Jellicle ball where they rejoice with their leader, Old Deuteronomy. One cat will be chosen to go to the "Heavyside Layer" and be reborn. The cats introduce themselves.

41.name: EverAfter
41.description: The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.

42.name: Rounders
42.description: A young, reformed gambler must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks, while balancing his relationship with his girlfriend and his commitments to law school.

43.name: Out of Sight
43.description: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

44.name: Can't Hardly Wait
44.description: Multicharacter teenage comedy about high school graduates with different agenda of life on graduation night.

45.name: Following
45.description: A young writer who follows strangers for material meets a thief who takes him under his wing.

46.name: Fallen
46.description: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

47.name: A Night at the Roxbury
47.description: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

48.name: Pleasantville
48.description: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom, where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

49.name: City of Angels
49.description: An angel on Earth, a doctor unable to believe, a patient with a secret, a love story made in Heaven.

50.name: Urban Legend
50.description: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.
